document_data.name: ''Sign of Tyr''
document_data.mainbody: A '''''sign of Tyr''''' was an enchanted defensive [[bracer]] of the [[Tyr]]ran faith in the late 15{{th}} century [[DR]].
document_data.Description: A ''sign of Tyr'' was a single leather armlet with a [[gold]]en disc attached to it. The disk was decorated with Tyr's ''[[holy symbol]]'', proudly announcing the wearer's devotion to the God of Justice.
document_data.Powers: The enchantments imbued into a ''sign of Tyr'' covered the wearer and their allies with an ''aura of protection'' that made it harder for foes to land a successful strike on the affected creatures.
document_data.Notable Owners: *[[Nayeli Goldflower]]: a [[paladin]] from the city of [[Daggerford]] and an adventurer who worked with other warriors of [[Waterdeep]], performing missions on behalf of [[Laeral Silverhand]] in the late 15{{th}} century DR.
